name: Path T Hypopharynx T
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Assign T3 If there is fixation of hemilarynx or larynx.

**Note 2:** For the following descriptions, assign the appropriate T category (T1, T2 or T3) based on the tumor size.

    Invasive tumor confined to one of the following subsites
       Laryngopharynx
       Postcricoid area
       Posterior pharyngeal wall
       Pyriform sinus

    Tumor invades more than one subsite of hypopharynx WITHOUT fixation of hemilarynx

    Oropharynx
    Larynx WITHOUT fixation

    Confined to hypopharynx
    Localized,  NOS
footnotes:
\* T4 [NOS] is not defined by UICC in the 7th edition. Approval has been provided by UICC to use "Tumor invades bone, nerve or extrinsic deep muscles" as T4 [NOS].
\# T4 [NOS] is not defined in AJCC 7th edition.
